original_text:
Arabian Nights
Informazioni generali
Software: NetEnt
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco:15
Puntata massima: 50 €
Minimo gettoni per linea: 1
Massimo gettoni per linea: 10
Valore minimo gettone: 0,01 €
Valore massimo gettone: 0,5 €
Jackpot: 3.000.000 €
Return to Player (RTP): 95,2%
Caratteristiche principali
Tutte le principali software house cercano per le loro slot dei temi coinvolgenti e avventurosi: sono molti i titoli che si rifanno a favole e leggende e anche Arabian Nights, di casa NetEnt ne è un esempio in piena regola.
Il tema è quello delle notti d’Oriente, ispirato in particolar modo alle vicissitudini di Aladino alle prese con la lampada magica e il genio in essa contenuto.
La grafica di questa slot, a differenza di come ci ha abituati NetEnt, non è molto elaborata: la schermata è la solita con in basso i tasti per il settaggio della partita e i rulli sono contenuti in una semplice cornice dorata su uno sfondo statico.
I simboli tematici sembrano provenire direttamente da “Le Mille e una notte” e pur non essendo particolarmente realistici offrono nel complesso un effetto molto piacevole.
La cosa che attrae di più in Arabian Nights è però senza dubbio il jackpot stellare in palio: 3.000.000 € fanno decisamente perdonare la grafica minimalista!
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
Disegnati su sfondi semplici monocromatici, i simboli che si alternano sui rulli di Arabian Nights si rifanno alla tradizione delle favole arabe: vediamo quindi il sorridente Aladino col gilet rosso e il turbante in testa, la lampada magica di colore dorato, un immancabile cammello, il cappello tipico arabo, le scarpe verdi con la punta arricciata e una tenda da deserto.
Troviamo anche in questa slot i numeri e le lettere che corrispondono alle carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso, nella migliore tradizione delle slot machine terrestri.
Il simbolo Wild è Aladino con i suoi baffi all’insù e un diamante in mano: può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli (tranne lo Scatter) per ottenere un allineamento vincente, con un premio moltiplicato per tre volte la puntata. Inoltre, se compare in una linea di pagamento per almeno due volte, paga di per sé. La combinazione più ambita in assoluto è quella costituita da 5 simboli Wild: in questo modo si otterrà il Jackpot da capogiro di 3.000.000 €!
Lo Scatter è rappresentato dalla lampada magica, che se compare almeno tre volte in una qualsiasi posizione sui rulli offre 15 free spins in cui tutte le combinazioni vincenti avranno un moltiplicatore di 3x; alle stesse condizioni si ottengono ulteriori moltiplicatori e giri gratuiti anche durante le partite gratis.
Anche lo Scatter ha più di una funzione: se compare due volte su una payline paga due volte la puntata, con tre volte si ha un moltiplicatore di 5x e con quattro di 20x; infine, se la lampada occupa tutti i cinque rulli si ottiene un pagamento pari a 500 volte la puntata!
Slot simili ad Arabian Nights
Il tema delle favole arabe è stato ampiamente sviluppato nelle slot machine: ricordiamo tra i vari titoli Arabian Oasis, Aladdin’s Treasure e Arabian Rose; segnaliamo inoltre Abra Kebab Ra che invece è incentrata sulla cucina araba.

raw_translation.response:
Arabian Nights
General Information:
Software: NetEnt
Reels: 5
Paylines: 15
Max Bet: €50
Minimum coins per line: 1
Maximum coins per line: 10
Minimum coin value: €0.01
Maximum coin value: €0.5
Jackpot: €3,000,000
Return to Player (RTP): 95.2%
Key Features:
The leading software houses all seek thrilling and adventurous themes for their slot games: many titles are inspired by fairy tales and legends. Arabian Nights, from NetEnt, is a perfect example of the genre.
The game is set in the mystical world of the Arabian nights, taking inspiration, in particular, from the story of Aladdin and the genie in the magic lamp.
Contrary to NetEnt's usual style, the game's graphics are not very elaborate: the screen layout is standard, with buttons to set up the game at the bottom. The reels are encased in a simple golden frame on a static background.
The themed symbols appear to come straight out of "The Thousand and One Nights" and, although not particularly realistic, they create an overall pleasant effect.
What attracts players most to Arabian Nights, however, is the amazing jackpot: €3,000,000 makes up for any lack of graphics!
Symbols, Wilds and Scatters:
Designed on simple monochromatic backgrounds, the symbols that alternate on the reels in Arabian Nights are inspired by traditional Arabian folklore. Among them, we see the smiling Aladdin wearing a red waistcoat and a turban, the golden magic lamp, an indispensable camel, the typical Arab hat, green shoes with a curled tip and a desert tent.
The game also features the numbers and letters that correspond to poker cards from 9 to Ace, following the best traditions of land-based slot machines.
The Wild symbol is Aladdin himself, with his mustache upturned and a diamond in his hand. It can replace all other symbols (except for the Scatter) to create a winning combination, with a prize multiplied by three times the bet. In addition, if it appears on at least two paylines, it pays out by itself. The most sought-after combination is undoubtedly the one made up of 5 Wild symbols, which triggers the whopping €3,000,000 jackpot!
The Scatter is represented by the magic lamp and appears in any position on the reels. If it appears at least three times, it triggers 15 free spins, during which all winning combinations have a 3x multiplier. Under the same conditions, further multipliers and free spins can be obtained.
The Scatter has more than one function: if it appears twice on a payline, it pays out twice the bet; three Scatters multiply the bet by 5x, four by 20x, and if the lamp occupies all five reels, the payout is a massive 500 times the bet!
Similar Slots to Arabian Nights:
The theme of Arabian folklore has been extensively developed in slot machines. Among the various titles, we recall Arabian Oasis, Aladdin’s Treasure, and Arabian Rose. Additionally, we recommend Abra Kebab Ra, which revolves around Arabian cuisine.

response.content:
Are you ready to experience the thrill of the Arabian Nights? Look no further than this exciting slot game - Arabian Nights! With its unique combination of adventure and the potential for huge payouts, this game is sure to keep you entertained for hours.

While the graphics may not be the most elaborate, Arabian Nights makes up for it with the well-thought-out theme and themed symbols. You'll feel like you're in the middle of an Arabian folklore story with every spin of the reels. And with the inclusion of Wild and Scatter symbols, as well as 15 free spins with a 3x multiplier feature, the excitement never stops!

Of course, with any slot game, there are bound to be a few duds. But with Arabian Nights, the potential for big wins is too good to pass up. We highly recommend this game to anyone looking for a fun and lucrative slot game experience. Just make sure to rub that genie's lamp for some extra luck!

Arabian Nights Symbols and Features

The symbols that appear on the reels in Arabian Nights are inspired by traditional Arabian folklore. Among them are Aladdin, the golden magic lamp, a camel, an Arab hat, green shoes with a curled tip, and a desert tent. Additionally, there are the numbers and letters that correspond to poker cards from 9 to Ace. The Wild symbol is Aladdin himself, while the Scatter is represented by the magic lamp. The game also features a jackpot of €3,000,000, which can be won by hitting the most sought-after combination made up of 5 Wild symbols. Moreover, the Scatter symbol triggers 15 free spins, during which all winning combinations have a 3x multiplier.

Arabian Nights Jackpot

The jackpot in the Arabian Nights slot game is a massive €3,000,000. It can be triggered by hitting the most sought-after combination that is made up of 5 Wild symbols. The Wild symbol is Aladdin himself, and it can replace all other symbols (except for the Scatter) to create a winning combination, with a prize multiplied by three times the bet. In addition, if it appears on at least two paylines, it pays out by itself.

Similar Slots to Arabian Nights

Overall Experience and Recommendation

Review: Arabian Nights
General Information:
Software: NetEnt
Reels: 5
Paylines: 15
Max Bet: €50
Minimum coins per line: 1
Maximum coins per line: 10
Minimum coin value: €0.01
Maximum coin value: €0.5
Jackpot: €3,000,000
Return to Player (RTP): 95.2%
Key Features:
The leading software houses all seek thrilling and adventurous themes for their slot games: many titles are inspired by fairy tales and legends. Arabian Nights, from NetEnt, is a perfect example of the genre.
The game is set in the mystical world of the Arabian nights, taking inspiration, in particular, from the story of Aladdin and the genie in the magic lamp.
Contrary to NetEnt's usual style, the game's graphics are not very elaborate: the screen layout is standard, with buttons to set up the game at the bottom. The reels are encased in a simple golden frame on a static background.
The themed symbols appear to come straight out of "The Thousand and One Nights" and, although not particularly realistic, they create an overall pleasant effect.
What attracts players most to Arabian Nights, however, is the amazing jackpot: €3,000,000 makes up for any lack of graphics!
Symbols, Wilds and Scatters:
Designed on simple monochromatic backgrounds, the symbols that alternate on the reels in Arabian Nights are inspired by traditional Arabian folklore. Among them, we see the smiling Aladdin wearing a red waistcoat and a turban, the golden magic lamp, an indispensable camel, the typical Arab hat, green shoes with a curled tip and a desert tent.
The game also features the numbers and letters that correspond to poker cards from 9 to Ace, following the best traditions of land-based slot machines.
The Wild symbol is Aladdin himself, with his mustache upturned and a diamond in his hand. It can replace all other symbols (except for the Scatter) to create a winning combination, with a prize multiplied by three times the bet. In addition, if it appears on at least two paylines, it pays out by itself. The most sought-after combination is undoubtedly the one made up of 5 Wild symbols, which triggers the whopping €3,000,000 jackpot!
The Scatter is represented by the magic lamp and appears in any position on the reels. If it appears at least three times, it triggers 15 free spins, during which all winning combinations have a 3x multiplier. Under the same conditions, further multipliers and free spins can be obtained.
The Scatter has more than one function: if it appears twice on a payline, it pays out twice the bet; three Scatters multiply the bet by 5x, four by 20x, and if the lamp occupies all five reels, the payout is a massive 500 times the bet!
Similar Slots to Arabian Nights:
The theme of Arabian folklore has been extensively developed in slot machines. Among the various titles, we recall Arabian Oasis, Aladdin’s Treasure, and Arabian Rose. Additionally, we recommend Abra Kebab Ra, which revolves around Arabian cuisine.
